title: My phone often disconnects from the Wi-Fi network on its own
answer:
l   After successfully connecting to the Wi-Fi network, keep the phone within range of the Wi-Fi hotspot to avoid losing the connection due to a weak signal.

l   For EMUI 2.0 and EMUI 2.3, select **Wi-Fi** in the **Settings** page to enter the Wi-Fi settings. Open the options menu, select **Advanced > Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep** and then select **Always**. The phone will always stay connected to the Wi-Fi network.

l   For EMUI 3.0, select **Wi-Fi** in the **Settings** page to enter the Wi-Fi settings. Select **Advanced settings > Keep Wi-Fi on during sleep** and then select **Always**. The phone will always stay connected to the Wi-Fi network.

l   If the problem persists, turn off the Wi-Fi function and then turn it back on or restart the Wi-Fi hotspot.
keywords: Wi-Fi, wireless network, connect to Wi-Fi
